    • Method Detail

      • downloadModelFromServer

        static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel downloadModelFromServer(java.lang.String url)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the ontology model from the ontology server. Consider correct url. Consider the possible big size of the ontology (and download time).
        Parameters:
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        Returns:
        the ontModel from the server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown in case the ontModel could not downloaded (because e.g. no connection, server offline, ...).
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the server does not contain an ontModel.

      • downloadModelFromServer

        static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel downloadModelFromServer(java.lang.String url,
                                                                 long timeout)
                                                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                 org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                 java.util.concurrent.CancellationException
        Method returns the ontology from the server. If there is no connection, the method retries in an interval the download until the given timeout is reached (or if null permanent). Consider, in this time the method blocks.
        Parameters:
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        timeout - is the timeout to limit the time. If 0 the method retries permanently until there is a result (maybe blocks forever!).
        Returns:
        the ontModel from the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown in case the application is interrupted.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the server does not keep an ontModel.
        java.util.concurrent.CancellationException - is thrown in case the timeout was reached and the download trial was canceled.

      • addModelToServer

        static void addModelToServer(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontModel,
                             java.lang.String url)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method adds (NOT replaces) the ontModel to the server.
        Parameters:
        ontModel - is the ontModel, which should be added to the server.
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown in case the the ontModel could not be uploaded (because e.g. no connection, server offline, ...).
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • addModelToServer

        static void addModelToServer(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontModel,
                             java.lang.String url,
                             long timeout)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                             org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                             java.util.concurrent.CancellationException
        Method adds (NOT replaces) the ontModel to the server. If there is no connection, the method retries in an interval the upload until the given timeout is reached. Consider, in this time the method blocks.
        Parameters:
        ontModel - is the ontModel, which should be added to the server.
        url - is the url of the ontology database server without suffix (server service form).
        timeout - is the timeout to limit the time. If 0 the method retries permanently until there is a result (maybe blocks forever!).
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown in case the application is interrupted.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the ontModel is null.
        java.util.concurrent.CancellationException - is thrown in case the timeout was reached and the upload trial was canceled.
